original_text: And the people of Israel said to the Lord, “We have sinned; do to us whatever seems good to you. Only please deliver us this day.”
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 여호와께 여쭈되 우리가 범죄하였사오니 주께서 보시기에 좋은 대로 우리에게 행하시려니와 오직 주께 구하옵나니 오늘 우리를 건져내옵소서 하고

sentences.original_text: And the people of Israel said to the Lord,
do to us whatever seems good to you.
Only please deliver us this day.
